patthana22.36:1.1.pli: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nasaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana22.36:2.1.pli: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.

patthana22.36:3.1.pli: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.

patthana22.36:4.1.pli: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naaraṇañca naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naaraṇañca dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana22.36:5.1.pli: Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe… avigate ekavīsa.

patthana22.36:7.1.pli: Nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo dhammo sanidassanasappaṭighassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … satta.

patthana22.36:8.1.pli: Naanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo dhammo sanidassanasappaṭighassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … satta.

patthana22.36:9.1.pli: Nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo ca dhammā sanidassanasappaṭighassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … satta.

patthana22.36:10.1.pli: Nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo dhammo anidassanaappaṭighassa araṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Naanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo dhammo anidassanaappaṭighassa araṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo ca dhammā anidassanaappaṭighassa araṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana22.36:11.1.pli: Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā ekavīsa, anantare tīṇi …pe… sahajāte nissaye ekavīsa, upanissaye tīṇi, pacchājāte kamme āhāre indriye jhāne magge vippayutte ekavīsa …pe… avigate ekavīsa.

patthana22.36:12.1.pli: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)

patthana22.4:1.1.pli: Nakusalaṃ nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakusalaṃ nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.

patthana22.4:2.1.pli: (Naakusale dve, naabyākate dve. Paṭhamaṃ gaṇitakena ekaṃ, dutiyaṃ gaṇitakena ekaṃ, tatiyaṃ gaṇitakena ekaṃ, sabbattha nava pañhā.)

patthana22.4:3.1.pli: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.

patthana22.4:4.1.pli: Nakusalaṃ naahetukañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.

patthana22.4:5.1.pli: Nakusalaṃ nahetuñceva nahetuvippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava. (Hetusahetukasadisaṃ.)

patthana22.4:6.1.pli: Nakusalaṃ nahetuvippayuttañceva nanahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo hetusampayutto ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.

patthana22.4:8.1.pli: Nakusalaṃ nahetuṃ naahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana22.4:9.1.pli: Naakusalaṃ nahetuṃ naahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana22.4:10.1.pli: Naabyākataṃ nahetuṃ naahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Gaṇitakena tīṇi pañhā.)

patthana22.4:11.1.pli: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.

patthana22.5:1.1.pli: Nakusalo nasappaccayo dhammo kusalassa sappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …. Ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā upanissaye cha. (Saṅkhataṃ sappaccayasadisaṃ.)

patthana22.5:2.1.pli: Nakusalaṃ nasanidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sanidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.

patthana23.14:1.1.pli: Nakusalaṃ namicchattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā akusalo micchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana23.14:2.1.pli: Nakusalaṃ nasammattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo sammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana23.14:3.1.pli: Nakusalaṃ naaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pañca, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… avigate pañca.

patthana23.15:1.1.pli: Nakusalaṃ namaggārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha …pe… avigate cha.

patthana23.15:2.1.pli: Nakusalaṃ namaggahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo maggahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana23.15:3.1.pli: Nakusalaṃ namaggādhipatiṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha …pe… avigate cha.

patthana23.16:1.1.pli: Nakusalo nauppanno dhammo kusalassa uppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana23.16:2.1.pli: Ārammaṇe aṭṭhārasa, adhipatiyā nava, upanissaye aṭṭhārasa.

patthana23.17:1.1.pli: Nakusalo napaccuppanno dhammo kusalassa paccuppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana23.17:2.1.pli: Ārammaṇe aṭṭhārasa, adhipatiyā anantare samanantare soḷasa, upanissaye aṭṭhārasa, natthiyā vigate soḷasa.

patthana23.17:3.1.pli: Nakusalaṃ naatītārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato atītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana23.17:4.1.pli: Nakusalaṃ naanāgatārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo anāgatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.

patthana23.17:5.1.pli: Nakusalaṃ napaccuppannārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana23.18:1.1.pli: Nakusalo naajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Ārammaṇe aṭṭhārasa, adhipatiyā soḷasa, upanissaye aṭṭhārasa, purejāte atthiyā avigate nava.

patthana23.18:2.1.pli: Nakusalo nabahiddhā dhammo bahiddhā kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Ārammaṇe aṭṭhārasa, adhipatiyā cha, upanissaye aṭṭhārasa, purejāte atthiyā avigate nava.

patthana23.18:3.1.pli: Nakusalaṃ naajjhattārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana23.18:4.1.pli: Nakusalaṃ nabahiddhārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana23.19:1.1.pli: Nakusalaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.

patthana23.19:2.1.pli: Naakusalaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.

patthana23.19:3.1.pli: Naabyākataṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.

patthana23.19:4.1.pli: Nakusalaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca naabyākataṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.

patthana23.19:5.1.pli: Naakusalaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca naabyākataṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.

patthana23.19:6.1.pli: Nakusalaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca naakusalaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana23.19:7.1.pli: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.

patthana23.19:8.1.pli: Nakusalaṃ naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato anidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.

patthana23.19:9.1.pli: Nakusalaṃ naanidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato anidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana23.2:1.1.pli: Nakusalaṃ navipākaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato vipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.

patthana23.2:2.1.pli: Naakusalaṃ navipākaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato vipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.

patthana23.2:3.1.pli: Nakusalaṃ navipākañca naakusalaṃ navipākañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato vipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana23.2:5.1.pli: Nakusalaṃ navipākadhammadhammaṃ paccayā kusalo vipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakusalaṃ navipākadhammadhammaṃ paccayā akusalo vipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.

patthana23.2:6.1.pli: Naakusalaṃ navipākadhammadhammaṃ paccayā akusalo vipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.

patthana23.2:7.1.pli: Nakusalaṃ navipākadhammadhammañca naakusalaṃ navipākadhammadhammañca dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo vipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana23.2:9.1.pli: Nakusalaṃ nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana23.2:10.1.pli: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.

patthana23.20:1.1.pli: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.

patthana23.20:2.1.pli: Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.

patthana23.20:3.1.pli: Naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve. (Cattāri gaṇitakena dve dve pañhā kātabbā. Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana23.20:5.1.pli: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana23.20:7.1.pli: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto naabyākato dhammo sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.

patthana23.20:8.1.pli: Ārammaṇe cuddasa, adhipatiyā dvādasa, anantare terasa, upanissaye ekavīsa, kamme sattarasa, natthiyā vigate terasa.

patthana23.21:1.1.pli: Navipākaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā vipākadhammadhammo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana23.21:2.1.pli: Navipākaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā vipākadhammadhammo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana23.21:3.1.pli: Navipākaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana23.22:1.1.pli: Naanupādinnupādāniyaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anupādinnupādāniyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha …pe… avigate cha.

patthana23.22:2.1.pli: Naanupādinnupādāniyaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anupādinnupādāniyo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana23.22:3.1.pli: Naupādinnupādāniyaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anupādinnupādāniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pañca, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… avigate pañca.

patthana23.23:1.1.pli: Nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha …pe… avigate cha.

patthana23.23:2.1.pli: Nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana23.23:3.1.pli: Nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.

patthana23.24:1.1.pli: Nasavitakkasavicāraṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā savitakkasavicāro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pannarasa …pe… avigate pannarasa.

patthana23.24:2.1.pli: Nasavitakkasavicāraṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā savitakkasavicāro akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava.

patthana23.24:3.1.pli: Nasavitakkasavicāraṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakkaavicāro abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā satta, adhipatiyā satta …pe… avigate satta.

patthana23.25:1.1.pli: Napītisahagataṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā pītisahagato kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā aṭṭhavīsa …pe… avigate aṭṭhavīsa.

patthana23.25:2.1.pli: Napītisahagataṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā pītisahagato akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā aṭṭhavīsa …pe… avigate aṭṭhavīsa.

patthana23.25:3.1.pli: Napītisahagato naabyākato dhammo pītisahagatassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Ārammaṇe aṭṭhavīsa, adhipatiyā anantare aṭṭhavīsa …pe… upanissaye aṭṭhavīsa, kamme catuvīsa, natthiyā vigate aṭṭhavīsa.

patthana23.26:1.1.pli: Nadassanena pahātabbaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana23.26:2.1.pli: Nadassanena pahātabbaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā dassanena pahātabbo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha …pe… avigate cha.

patthana23.26:3.1.pli: Nadassanena pahātabbaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.

patthana23.27:1.1.pli: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana23.27:2.1.pli: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā dassanena pahātabbahetuko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate nava.

patthana23.27:3.1.pli: Nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.

patthana23.28:1.1.pli: Naācayagāmiṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā ācayagāmī kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha …pe… avigate cha.

patthana23.28:2.1.pli: Naācayagāmiṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā ācayagāmī akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana23.28:3.1.pli: Naācayagāmiṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nevācayagāmināpacayagāmī abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pañca, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… avigate pañca.

patthana23.29:1.1.pli: Nasekkhaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sekkho kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha …pe… avigate cha.

patthana23.29:2.1.pli: Nasekkhaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nevasekkhanāsekkho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana23.29:3.1.pli: Nasekkhaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nevasekkhanāsekkho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pañca, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… avigate pañca.

patthana23.3:1.1.pli: Nakusalo naupādinnupādāniyo dhammo abyākatassa upādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … cha pañhā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Ārammaṇe cha, anantare samanantare upanissaye cha, purejāte tīṇi, kamme pañca, āhāre tīṇi, atthiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana23.3:2.1.pli: Nakusalaṃ naanupādinnupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pañca, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate pañca.

patthana23.3:3.1.pli: Nakusalaṃ naanupādinnaanupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo anupādinnaanupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe cha …pe… āsevane tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
